scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules .turbo apps/*/.turbo packages/*/.turbo
scripts.docker:build: pnpm --filter dev-server build && INCONVO_SANDBOX_API_KEY=build-placeholder docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml build
scripts.docker:up: set -a; [ -f ~/.inconvo/config.env ] && . ~/.inconvo/config.env; set +a; INCONVO_SANDBOX_API_KEY=$(uuidgen) docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml up
